title: test_cached_dataset is flaky on CrippledFS

labels.name: severity-important
labels.description: major effect on the usability of a package, without rendering it completely unusable to everyone

body:
```
FAIL: datalad.tests.test_utils_cached_dataset.test_cached_dataset
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 174, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 728, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/tests/test_utils_cached_dataset.py", line 248, in test_cached_dataset
    decorated_test3()
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/utils.py", line 1019, in intermediator
    return to_be_wrapper(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 728, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils_cached_dataset.py", line 184, in newfunc
    return f(*(arg[:-1] + (clone_ds,)), **kw)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/tests/test_utils_cached_dataset.py", line 218, in decorated_test3
    assert_in(origin, where)
AssertionError: None not found in ['00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001', '6929d679-6cca-407f-8741-94ed39d35541', 'e5abd4ed-c6d2-4e11-843f-ee00faf18fa9']
```
from https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/4776/checks?check_run_id=918734657
